title: Psycho Alphas: Part One
description: Dark, deranged, unhinged...No one's ever gonna want us Bunny, not really.I’m the kind of Omega only good for keeping Alphas out of ruts.Rejected by my own mate.Unwanted.Even though all I dream of is a sketchbook and an alpha to cuddle.Now, I've been kidnapped and dragged on stage for auction: to be sold like a trophy. Everything seems hopeless until I scent match an alpha hidden in the crowd.He’s gotta be the highest bidder, right?He won't leave me like the last one did…But the Alpha who takes my chain isn't the one I want. Knox Wilde might have spent a fortune for my collar, but only because he owns the scent match I just discovered. Insane, cruel, and controlling, Knox wants to use me like his plaything to punish my mate—the Alpha he's keeping muzzled in the basement.But he doesn't know the kind of crazy he's messing with, Bunny.He wanted a pet he could ruin without a thought?But I might just become his worst obsession.This is the first part of a dark MFMM omegaverse romance duet. Please check trigger warnings. Set in the same universe as Queen of Diamonds, with some crossover characters, but books can be read in any order.
author: Marie Mackay
